text: Pita balalena, ‘ami take kakhano'i tomadera sathe pathabo na yataksana na tomara allah‌ra name angikara kara ye, tomara take amara kache niye asabe'i [1], abasya yadi tomara bestita haye para (tabe bhinna katha).’ Tarapara yakhana tara tamra kache pratijna karala takhana tini balalena, ‘amara ye bisaye katha balachi, allah tara bidhayaka [2].’
